Pros: Tight-knit team that works well together for the most part. Senior managers are cool, very down to earth and ready to assist even if you don't directly report to them. If you want stability with a government-backed institution, KCB is your go-to choice. Loans are awesomely priced at low interest for employees.
Cons: Procurement could use some speed in terms of how long it takes to get tools, services, etc onboarded. Pay is ok. Benefits are ok as well.

Pros: Learn the intricacies of the banking industry
Cons: Sometimes I felt underemployed, and the department I was interning at had peak seasons and low seasons

Pros: Friendly colleagues, good benefits overall
Cons: Unreasonable sales target, too much pressure

Pros: Friendly work Environment from management to colleagues
Cons: Long working hours, requires proper time management.

Cons: Sometimes you work till late
